author: Stephen
comment: I don't know if this an issue with Social Diabetes, or with Librelink, but so far I've not been able to see my Libre data in this app. I've double-checked the login details, unlinked and relinked my Libreview  account, and then waited several days to see if it just appeared. Nothing yet...
It used to be the best app for diabetes logging and control. But now it crashes all the time. Even the development team gave up on fixing it. Now I am giving up on this app :(

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Hello Taisa, thank you for your comment. 
We greatly appreciate if you put in contact with our support department: https://www.socialdiabetes.com/en/contact

Best regards, 
SocialDiabetes Team

author: John Russell
comment: It's a logging app. Only a couple of meters which I've never seen are listed on the Connections page. The Freestyle Libre isn't although it says it is reading it, nothing shows up.  Otherwise there's a UK food database (in Spanish) of carbohydrate, and a simple calculator.   There doesnt appear to be a way of getting reports out of it. Given the Libre app does the basics better, Im not sure what the purpose of the app is. There are lots of useful things it could do to improve diabetes care; just that logging isnt one of them.

author: WildErich
comment: Good way to talk with friends!

author: Louise Coates
comment: Can't get my readings into the app :-(

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: Please, write us to support@socialdiabetes.com and we will help you to configure integration.

title: Freestyle Libre

author: Lauri Slaybaugh
comment: Just entered a bunch of my data and noticed that there is no FASTING category and also the Nightly Testing (before bed) is not showing on the reports.  I looked at the same data online and it does not match up - Nightly Testing is showing as before Breakfast which is not true.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Hi Lauri

Please write us at support@socialdiabetes.com and we try to resolve all doubts and problems., thanks!

Fixed web Nightly Testing.

author: Kent Teeters
comment: I been type1 for 5 months this helps must use people with type 1
title: Awesome app

author: Sebastián Haro
comment: The best app for monitoring your diabetes. At first you have to provide some info, but then using it is extremely simple. Congrats to the developer.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: Thanks Sebastian!!! :)

title: Amazing

author: Amando Langoey
comment: There's an option to view at least 3 months in the See Entries section. At the moment you can only view a max of one week, which is too short. I like the integrated and comprehensive food and carb search.
title: I will give 5 if...

author: Sergio Olavarrieta
comment: I've been using this app for two years and it's great. I keep a precise track of my diabetes

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Hola Sergio

La app los calcula sola, como el factor de resistencia, pero los haremos visibles para que cada uno los configure. Aunque no gusta mas facilitar la vida y no dar algunos parámetros que mucha gente desconoce. Tal vez una opción "Ver parámetros avanzados" este bien. Si quieres escríbenos a soporte@socialdiabetes.com y hablamos.

Saludos

author: Daniel Olmo
comment: Thanks for the quick fix great job 5*☺

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: thanks Daniel! :)

title: Last update

comment: I like this app because it's really been a great help with keeping me on track and disciplined in tracking my numbers. Makes managing my diabetes a lot less stressful

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: Thanks Lorenzo!

title: Good thing

author: Cin Skjefte
comment: I love this app. Easy to use. I like the fact I can keep track of my sugars with just a click. I can also send my reading to my Doc so without having an appointment we can make adjustments.
title: Wonderful

comment: Fantastic app for monitoring your diabetes it is so easy to keep track of glucose levels, carbs and insulin.

comment: You would get 5 stars of you as the capability to import from Accu Check

comment: Very nice application and helped me alot in control of blood sugar

comment: Excellent app. Really helps me manage my diabetes well.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Hi Charlie! 

You can use Glucose only or maybe after dinner.

author: Guillermo Rueda
comment: I tried 6 different apps simultaneously for 2 weeks. My only criteria was that it should sync the information with the cloud so I could also use a browser in my computer or sync the data with a new smartphone/OS when I change my current one. This one beat the other ones easily, and the only other one that looked as good as this one had almost twice the annual price for the pro version so this one won easily. Keep the good work Social Diabetes!

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: uau! thanks Guillermo!!!

title: Best overall. Cheapest pro version

author: Andrew Thompson
comment: These App. is perfect to keep you informed about your highs and low.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: Thanks Andrew!

title: Social Diabetes App

author: Madi Coronado
comment: I love this app, would reccomend to any diabetic. Easy to use and its good with advice on carbs and insulin. Graphs are very useful.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: Thanks Madeline!

title: Amazing!!!

author: Barry Foxworth
comment: To view the PDF graphs, you need at least one week's worth of data, per the author. Response was prompt. Your doctor will be pleased with the reports.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Hi Barry

PDF report include 3 charts with detailed information, deviation and averages, and summarized PDF is the best help for you doctor. 

To see the graphics you need at least one week of data. 

If you need help, feel free to contact us at support@socialdiabetes.com

Best!!

title: Excellent!

author: Rojvan Sütcü
comment: When an app goes so far that it makes my life even better than it was before, then one cannot rate it lower than 5. Even though there are some stuff you guys have to work on, but I think you already know it. I hope this app will be here forever, because I feel alot better already with this app. Thank you alot for helping me through my day. I love you guys!

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Thank Rojvan!

Please write us and send yours suggestions, support@socialdiabetes.com

All the best!

comment: Great app but sometimes changes after breakfast for after or before snack?

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Hi Ian!

Write to support@socialdiabetes.com so we can help you.

Thanks!

author: Jessica McGee
comment: Makes tracking and management so easy! Very easy to use too

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: Thanks Jessica!

title: Great app!

author: Vadim Frolov
comment: You should sort glucose values before showing it (daily glucose chart). Otherwise values on x-axis are not monotonicaly increasing. To reproduce: add values for today, then add values for yesterday. Add another value for today. See the chart. 2. It will be great if dots are connected by line on glucose chart.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content: Thanks Vadim, fixing it!

title: Charts

author: Mitchell Lane
comment: While the app isn't particularly pretty or intuitive initially, it is packed with features and is a brilliant way of monitoring your diabetes once you get the hang of it.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Thanks Mitchell

Please, write us with your suggestions support@socialdiabetes.com and we will try to improve!

Best!

title: Excellent companion

author: Zeljko Baric
comment: Very useful application

author: Rawan Zalzala
comment: Its working well I love it
title: Awesome

author: Chitrak Bansal
comment: Best in class

author: Meschell Nash
comment: Grateful for application

author: Holly Hoard
comment: Easy to input data and keep track of your sugars. But I don't like the pop-up alert every time I want to exit the app. It sucks my battery FAST if I don't exit each time. I also hate the new trend alerts. Very annoying and there's no way to disable them in the current version. Uninstalling for now..

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Hi Holly

We want to tell you that there is already a new version with an option to disable trend notifications and no more popup to exit app.

Thanks for your feedback.

Best Regards

title: It's ok... but annoying

author: Peg Grubb
comment: I really like this app. Just having it on my phone and tablet makes me more aware causing me to remember to test. I also find myself doing a better job of really paying attention to my carb intake.  The only addition I would like to see is a check off or editable permanent space for oral meds. Many diabetics take other medications and it would serve to remind one to also take those meds. The new timer is GREAT. Reminds me to check again following a low glucose. I've recommended this app to friends as well as my health provider and the Diabetes team at Kaiser. Thanks for writing it!

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Thanks Peg!

We will keep improving every day!

Best regards!

author: neil timlin
comment: I'm getting my diabetes under control with this
title: It's really good

author: Jack Francione
comment: It's a very easy to use application. It would be nice to be able to edit entries.

reply.author: SocialDiabetes
reply.content:
Hi Jack

In control list, touch and hold on control for edit and delete.

Best!

comment: Well designed..Excellent program!

comment: Can't understand the social aspect, though! I'll try to update/upgrade in the next few months

reply.content:
hi David
